meta.name: Waterproof ReSet Call Point
meta.description: Waterproof call point with resettable function
meta.heroTitle: IP 67 Manual Call Point With Resettable Operating Element
meta.heroDescription: The Waterproof ReSet call point is compatible with most conventional fire alarm systems, it is a unique manual call point that simulates break glass activation whilst offering the user the benefits of a re-settable operating element. An activation indicator drops into view on activation. The unit is then simply reset with a key and is ready for immediate re-use.
